p: Six of these plants ( Alchornea cordifolia Müll. Arg., Annona senegalensis; Carica papaya; Hymenocardia acida; Justicia secunda; and Vigna unguiculata) were already cited elsewhere by Congolese traditional healers in the management of sickle cell disease, and they have shown in vitro antisickling activities [ 4– 6, 14, 23– 33].
